channel.title: Java question pl0x
channel.description:
Hey: is it possible to store a used integer into another so I can use the second integer to define the coordinates of the first. For example if I used the absX from my client.java to define where a player is standing and then stored that and then the player moved and I used the stored integer to put something in the player's previous location.
Is this possible? and if so can you lead me to the correct place.

item.title: Java question pl0x
item.dc:creator: @Sir_Jay Sir Jay
item.description:
@Sir_Jay wrote:

Hey, cheers for the informative post man… What I was working towards was firemaking. By storing where the player WAS standing when he lit the fire like

light fire{
storecoord;
}

and then put the stored coord and put the ashes down in a certain amount of time…and delete the fire object.

Read full topic
